false_start.name: False Start
false_start.description: An offensive player moves after taking a set position before the snap.

offside.name: Offside
offside.description: A defensive player is in the neutral zone or crosses the line of scrimmage before the snap.

holding.name: Holding
holding.description: A player illegally grasps or pulls an opponent to impede their movement.
holding.enforcement: From the spot of the foul

pass_interference.name: Pass Interference
pass_interference.description: A player interferes with an opponent's opportunity to catch a forward pass.
pass_interference.enforcement: From the spot of the foul

personal_foul.name: Personal Foul
personal_foul.description: Unnecessary roughness, unsportsmanlike conduct, or other personal fouls.
personal_foul.enforcement: From the spot of the foul

targeting.name: Targeting
targeting.description: A player targets and makes forcible contact with the head or neck area of a defenseless opponent.
targeting.enforcement: From the spot of the foul, player ejection

unsportsmanlike_conduct.name: Unsportsmanlike Conduct
unsportsmanlike_conduct.description: Conduct that is not in the spirit of fair play or is considered unsportsmanlike.
unsportsmanlike_conduct.enforcement: From the spot of the foul

delay_of_game.name: Delay of Game
delay_of_game.description: The offense fails to snap the ball before the play clock expires.

illegal_formation.name: Illegal Formation
illegal_formation.description: The offense is not properly aligned at the snap.

illegal_motion.name: Illegal Motion
illegal_motion.description: An offensive player is in motion illegally at the snap.
